results.title: A Patient with Complex Gout with an Autoinflammatory Syndrome and a Sternoclavicular Joint Arthritis as Presenting Symptoms
results.text_hl: Normal @CHEMICAL_Uric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014527 @@@uric acid@@@ levels do not exclude a @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Gouty</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015210 @@@gouty@@@ attack

citations.NLM: Fedeli MM, Vecchi M, Rodoni Cassis P. A Patient with Complex Gout with an Autoinflammatory Syndrome and a Sternoclavicular Joint Arthritis as Presenting Symptoms Case Rep Rheumatol. 2020;2020():5026490. PMID: 32082683
citations.BibTeX: @article{32082683, title={A Patient with Complex Gout with an Autoinflammatory Syndrome and a Sternoclavicular Joint Arthritis as Presenting Symptoms}, author={Fedeli MM and Vecchi M and Rodoni Cassis P}, journal={Case Rep Rheumatol}, volume={2020}, pages={5026490}}

results.title: Case Report: Severe Hematological, Muscle and Liver Toxicity Caused by Drugs and Artichoke Infusion Interaction in an Elderly Polymedicated Patient.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Case report, in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with a history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Gliclazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005907 @@@gliclazide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Diazepam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003975 @@@diazepam@@@, recently medicated for a @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Gouty</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015210 @@@gouty crisis@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Colchicine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003078 @@@colchicine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Clonixin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003002 @@@clonixin@@@ without improvement.

citations.NLM: Campos MG, Machado J, Costa ML, Lino S, Correia F, Maltez F. Case Report: Severe Hematological, Muscle and Liver Toxicity Caused by Drugs and Artichoke Infusion Interaction in an Elderly Polymedicated Patient. Curr Drug Saf. 2018;13(1):44-50. PMID: 28901251
citations.BibTeX: @article{28901251, title={Case Report: Severe Hematological, Muscle and Liver Toxicity Caused by Drugs and Artichoke Infusion Interaction in an Elderly Polymedicated Patient.}, author={Campos MG and Machado J and Costa ML and Lino S and Correia F and Maltez F}, journal={Curr Drug Saf}, volume={13}, number={1}, pages={44-50}}
